channel.title: Politics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Politics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Florida’s CAIR threatens lawsuit against DeSantis after he labels group a ‘foreign terrorist’ organization
item.description: CAIR Florida promised to sue after Gov. DeSantis labeled the Muslim civil rights group a "foreign terrorist organization" in an executive order.

item.title: Trump says Rep. Crockett's Senate run 'a gift to Republicans': 'Can't imagine she wins'

item.title: Master Messenger: Trump Goes Full MAGA at Pennsylvania Rally, Hands GOP the 2026 Talking Points
JB Pritzker Is an Illegal Immigrant's Best Friend — Signs New Anti-ICE Law

item.description: In a new profile in The New York Times, former Vice President Kamala Harris continued to demur when asked if she will run for president in 2028.
